dict.acceptation: 有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的；空谈的；

sent.orig: Windy, windy, I can feel the wind.
sent.trans: 大风，大风，我能感觉到风。

sent.orig: BNearly everyday. If it's raining or freezing cold and windy, I'll catch the bus.
sent.trans: 几乎每天都是。如果是下雨或者刮风以及寒冷的天气，我就乘公共汽车。

sent.orig: A windy march and a rainy April makes a beautiful May.
sent.trans: 三月刮和风，雨下四月里，五月风光多美丽。

sent.orig: Why was Candlestick Park so windy and gusty?
sent.trans: 埃德尔斯蒂克公园里为什么会有那么多的强劲阵风？

sent.orig: He experienced different weather conditions-windy spring days, overcast winter days, and sunny summer mornings.
sent.trans: 他体验了不同的天气状况-有风的春天、昏暗的冬天和阳光普照的夏日早晨。
